name: Cargo Statitics
query:
SELECT 
    tb.cargo_type AS 'Cargo Type',
    tb.work_type AS 'Work Type',
    tb.container_size AS 'Container Size',
    tb.container_content AS 'Container Content',
    EXTRACT (YEAR FROM tb.eta_date) YEAR,
    EXTRACT (MONTH FROM tb.eta_date) MONTH,
    COUNT(tb.name) AS 'NUMBER'
FROM
    tabCargo tb
WHERE
    tb.docstatus = 1
	AND tb.cargo_type not in ("Break Bulk")
        AND tb.manifest_check = 'Confirm'
        and tb.work_type is not null
GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM eta_date), EXTRACT(MONTH FROM eta_date), tb.cargo_type, tb.work_type, tb.container_size
